patthana5.2:1.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:2.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:3.1.pli: Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)

patthana5.2:4.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.2:5.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto kusalo dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:6.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā cattāri …pe… upanissaye cattāri …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:7.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:8.1.pli: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:9.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:10.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:11.1.pli: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:12.1.pli: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:13.1.pli: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… āsevane dve …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:14.1.pli: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:16.1.pli: Vipākadhammadhammaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipākadhammadhammo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:18.1.pli: Vipākaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:19.1.pli: Nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:20.1.pli: Vipākaṃ abyākatañca nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca vipāko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:21.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… upanissaye cattāri, purejāte dve, āsevane ekaṃ …pe… sampayutte cattāri …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:22.1.pli: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:23.1.pli: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnaanupādāniyo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:25.1.pli: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:26.1.pli: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:27.1.pli: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:28.1.pli: Anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnaanupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:29.1.pli: Anupādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākatañca anupādinnaanupādāniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:30.1.pli: Upādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākatañca anupādinnupādāniyaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca anupādinnupādāniyo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:31.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:32.1.pli: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:33.1.pli: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve.)

patthana5.2:34.1.pli: Saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:35.1.pli: Asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:36.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana5.2:37.1.pli: Savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:38.1.pli: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … cattāri.

patthana5.2:39.1.pli: Avitakkaavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkaavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:40.1.pli: Avitakkaavicāraṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca avitakkavicāramatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:41.1.pli: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalañca avitakkaavicāraṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ …pe… savitakkasavicāraṃ kusalañca avitakkavicāramattaṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:43.1.pli: Savitakkasavicāraṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:44.1.pli: Avitakkavicāramattaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:45.1.pli: Savitakkasavicāraṃ akusalañca avitakkavicāramattaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:47.1.pli: Savitakkasavicāraṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:48.1.pli: Hetuyā sattatiṃsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe aṭṭhavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane ekādasa …pe… avigate sattatiṃsa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:49.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:50.1.pli: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:51.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:52.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ kusalañca sukhasahagataṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha dasa. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:53.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:54.1.pli: Sukhasahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:55.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:56.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ akusalañca sukhasahagataṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha dasa. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:57.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:58.1.pli: Sukhasahagataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:59.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:60.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ abyākatañca sukhasahagataṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha dasa. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:61.1.pli: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:62.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:63.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:64.1.pli: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:65.1.pli: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:66.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca dassanena pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:67.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:68.1.pli: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe dasa, adhipatiyā dve …pe… avigate dasa. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:69.1.pli: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:70.1.pli: Ācayagāmiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ācayagāmī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:71.1.pli: Apacayagāmiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca apacayagāmī kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:72.1.pli: Ācayagāmiṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ācayagāmī akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:73.1.pli: Nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevācayagāmināpacayagāmī abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:74.1.pli: Sekkhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sekkho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:75.1.pli: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:76.1.pli: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:77.1.pli: Sekkhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sekkho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:78.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana5.2:79.1.pli: Parittaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:80.1.pli: Mahaggataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:81.1.pli: Appamāṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:82.1.pli: Parittaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:83.1.pli: Parittaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paritto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:84.1.pli: Mahaggataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:85.1.pli: Appamāṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:86.1.pli: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe satta …pe… purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme terasa …pe… avigate terasa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:87.1.pli: Parittārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:88.1.pli: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:89.1.pli: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:90.1.pli: Parittārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:91.1.pli: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:92.1.pli: Parittārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parittārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:93.1.pli: Mahaggatārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca mahaggatārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:94.1.pli: Appamāṇārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appamāṇārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:95.1.pli: Majjhimaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:96.1.pli: Paṇītaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paṇīto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:97.1.pli: Hīnaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hīno akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:98.1.pli: Majjhimaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:99.1.pli: Paṇītaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paṇīto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:100.1.pli: Majjhimaṃ abyākatañca paṇītaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca majjhimo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:101.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:102.1.pli: Sammattaniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sammattaniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:103.1.pli: Aniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:104.1.pli: Micchattaniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca micchattaniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:105.1.pli: Aniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:106.1.pli: Aniyataṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca aniyato abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:107.1.pli: Maggārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:108.1.pli: Maggahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:109.1.pli: Maggādhipatiṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.

patthana5.2:110.1.pli: Maggārammaṇaṃ kusalañca maggādhipatiṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:111.1.pli: Maggahetukaṃ kusalañca maggādhipatiṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggahetuko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:113.1.pli: Maggārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:114.1.pli: Maggādhipatiṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca maggādhipati abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana5.2:115.1.pli: Maggārammaṇaṃ abyākatañca maggādhipatiṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca maggārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Sabbattha nava. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:116.1.pli: Uppanno kusalo dhammo uppannassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:117.1.pli: Uppanno akusalo dhammo uppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:118.1.pli: Uppanno abyākato dhammo uppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:119.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:120.1.pli: Paccuppanno kusalo dhammo paccuppannassa kusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:121.1.pli: Paccuppanno akusalo dhammo paccuppannassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Sabbattha ekaṃ. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:122.1.pli: Paccuppanno abyākato dhammo paccuppannassa abyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana5.2:123.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… upanissaye tīṇi …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:124.1.pli: Atītārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:125.1.pli: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:126.1.pli: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:127.1.pli: Atītārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:128.1.pli: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:129.1.pli: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:130.1.pli: Atītārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca atītārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:131.1.pli: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:132.1.pli: Paccuppannārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha tīṇi. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:133.1.pli: Ajjhattaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:134.1.pli: Bahiddhā kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:135.1.pli: Ajjhattaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:136.1.pli: Bahiddhā akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:137.1.pli: Ajjhattaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana5.2:138.1.pli: Bahiddhā abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:139.1.pli: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:140.1.pli: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:141.1.pli: Ajjhattārammaṇaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhattārammaṇo abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha dve. Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana5.2:142.1.pli: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:143.1.pli: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:144.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Ekaṃ.)

patthana5.2:145.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Dve.)

patthana5.2:146.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Tīṇi.)

patthana5.2:147.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cattāri.)

patthana5.2:148.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Pañca.)

patthana5.2:149.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cha.)

patthana5.2:150.1.pli: Anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanasappaṭigho abyākato ca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Satta.)

patthana5.2:151.1.pli: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.)

patthana5.2:152.1.pli: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ abyākatañca anidassanasappaṭighaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Satta.) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana5.2:153.1.pli: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekaṃ, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
